name: Sol (Desmazio, Zman2023, azuldev, Gannon46, crankymagician, Yurthoz)
name_original: Sol (Desmazio, Zman2023, azuldev, Gannon46, crankymagician, Yurthoz)
description:
Some people cling to life after they have expired. Find those who show the signs of life and restore their bodies. But only some will take their second chance... See who wants to live, and give them the parts they need. As for those without any sign of life... Well the spare parts have to come from somewhere!

Controls

WASD for Movement, Space to interact

Credits

Code: Desmazio, CrankyMagician, Azuldev
Art: Yurthoz

Game Design: Gannon46

Audio: Zman2023
